138343.<%sM_ITEM>の書を 捨てて\n<%sM_GET_ITEM>の書を 手に入:
The <%sM_ITEM> will be discarded
to obtain the <%sM_GET_ITEM>.
Are you sure?
<yesno2><close>

138344.スキルノートが いっぱいで\nこれ以上 手に入れることが できません。\nどのス:
You cannot carry any more Skill Notebooks.
Which Skill Notebook do you wish to
discard?
<break>

139149.手に入れなかった スキルノートは\nこの場で 消えてしまいます。\n本当に よろ:
If you decline obtaining this Skill Notebook,
it will disappear. Are you sure?
<yesno2><close>

139152.習得中のスキルです。\n<break>: It's a skill in the process of being learned.<break>

139180.すでに <%sM_CATEGORY>のノートを\n覚えているので このスキルとは:
You've already learned a <%sM_CATEGORY>
Skill Notebook, you cannot replace this
skill.
<bw_break>

139285.同じ系統のスキルは ひとつしか\n覚えることが できません。\n忘れるスキルを:
You can only learn one skill in the same
line. Choose a skill you'd like to forget.<break>

139287.選択中の <%sM_SKILL_LINE>を 忘れて\n<%sM_NEW_SKI:
Are you sure you want to forget the currently
selected <%sM_SKILL_LINE> and learn
<%sM_NEW_SKILL_LINE> instead?
<yesno2><close>

139288.忘れるスキルを 選んでください。\n<break>: Choose a skill you'd like to forget.<break>

140707.書かれているスキルが\nすべて同じスキルノートを すでに もっていた！\n<br:
All of the skills written here are already in another Skill Notebook that you possess!
silently closed the Skill Notebook.

142630.この スキルノートを 持っていきますか？\n<yesno><close>:
Take this Skill Notebook with you?
<yesno><close>

142763.<%sM_CATEGORY>のノートは\nすでに おぼえています。\nおなじ系統:
You already know a <%sM_CATEGORY>
Notebook. Please swap it with a skill
from the same family.
<break>

143598.習得中の スキルノートは\n捨てる事が できません。\n他のスキルノートを 選ん:
You cannot throw away Skill Notebooks you
are in the process of learning. Please choose
a different one.
<bw_break>

151938.<color_yellow>\nすでに クルクルポシェットへ送った\nスキルノー:
<color_yellow>
It seems the Bag o' Books can't receive any
more of your Skill Notebooks. Go and receive
your reward!
<end>

151939.<se_nots Joutyu_SE 39>\n<%sM_GET_ITEM>の書:
<se_nots Joutyu_SE 39>
The <%sM_GET_ITEM> Book was sent to
the Bag o' Books with a magical power!
You've sent <%dM_SEND_NUM> so far.
<end>

151940.<se_nots Joutyu_SE 39>\n<%sM_GET_ITEM>の書:
The <%sM_GET_ITEM> Book was sent to the Bag o' Books with a magical power!
It seems that you can't send any more. Go and see the Bag o' Books for your reward!

154174.<color_yellow>\n学園内ではスキルポイントを\nいつでも 増やした:
<color_yellow>You can allocate or reassign your skill points
